mapper.select: SELECT MAIN_CATE_ID, MAIN_CATE_NM FROM MAIN_CATEGORIES ORDER BY MAIN_CATE_NM
SELECT SUB_CATE_ID, SUB_CATE_NM FROM SUB_CATEGORIES WHERE MAIN_CATE_ID = #{MAIN_CATE_ID} ORDER BY SUB_CATE_NM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (SUB_CATE_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_PRICE, COST_PRICE, IS_VISIBLE, INPUT_DT, INPUT_ID) VALUES (#{SUB_CATE_ID}, #{PRODUCT_NAME}, UUID(), #{PRODUCT_DESC}, #{PRODUCT_PRICE}, #{COST_PRICE}, #{IS_VISIBLE}, NOW(), #{INPUT_ID})
INSERT INTO options (PRODUCT_ID, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_VALUE, ADDITIONAL_PRICE, INPUT_DT, INPUT_ID) VALUES (#{PRODUCT_ID}, #{OPTION_NAME}, #{OPTION_VALUE}, #{ADDITIONAL_PRICE}, NOW(), #{INPUT_ID})
INSERT INTO inventories (PRODUCT_ID, OPTION_ID, QUANTITY, INPUT_DT, INPUT_ID) VALUES (#{PRODUCT_ID}, #{OPTION_ID}, #{QUANTITY}, NOW(), #{INPUT_ID})
INSERT INTO product_img (PRODUCT_ID, IMAGE_URL, ALT_TEXT, SORT_NUMBER, IS_MAIN, INPUT_DT) VALUES (#{PRODUCT_ID}, #{IMAGE_URL}, #{ALT_TEXT}, #{SORT_NUMBER}, #{IS_MAIN}, NOW())
